title: Syahi
description: Refering myself as pen and my love as ink
content:
Chalte chalte har baar girta hun
        Udte udte har baar mai marta hun
        Aasun ab phishal rhe hai iss ret ki tarah
        Har raat sawera hone ka intezaar karta hun
        Sawal mere hazar ho gye, panne khatam hona na hona uske hath mai hai
        Kalam sukha de meri koi matlab nhi, mai aasuo se syahi bharta hun.

title: Ladke
description: Of course, ladki ka darja bohot upr hai, pr ladko ki taraf se kuch lines
content:
Zimmedariyan bhar jati hain koi khwaab nhi hota
        Sawal bohot aise hote jinka koi jawaab nhi hota
        Khushi sabki chahiye or apna koi khyal nhi hota
        Sab sath leke chalna to hai pr koi saath nhi hota
        Kuch ladke hi hain, bas ladte hi hain
        Kuch gharpe bhi hain bas padhte ni hain
        Bahar bhi hain kuch aawara ladke
        Or chhip k baithe kuch nakara gharpe
        Ladki hue to gudiya laadli laxmi hue hai
        Ladka hai to aaya hai sahaara banke
        Shayad vo hasta chehra mehnat k peeche thak gya hai
        Haal mat puchna pr, usko “sab theek hai” ratt gya hai
        Kya krna hai zindagi me pta hai usse, kya krna tha kahi dabb gya hai
        Vo ladka hi hai jo akela marr k bhi bach gya hai.

title: Nhi Janta
description: Tired feeling
content:
Tere khwab k sahare mai kab tak jee paunga, nhi janta
        Tuje in panno pe mai kab tak likh paunga, nhi janta
        Saanse to chl rhi hai meri, dhadkan kab sun paunga, nhi janta
        Bas janta hu ki ek talaash pe nikla hu
        Laut k aaunga ya laash ban jaunga, nhi janta.

title: Kabhi mila nhi tujse, Pr janta hu tuje
description: Scene: Imaging a girl who's waiting for me
content:
Kabhi mila nhi tujse, Pr janta hu tuje
            Bhot nadan hai, Pr manta hu tuje
            Chhoti si baat pr rooth jati hai
            Phir gale laga kr sab bhool jati hai
            Kabhi mila nhi tujse, Pr janta hu tuje
            Meri har cheez ka khyal kaise rakh leti hai tu
            Na hoke bhi yha, mere pass kaise reh leti hai tu
            Kabhi mila nhi tujse, pr janta hu tuje
            Bhot jidhi hai, sochti hai apni har baat manwa to aata hi hoga
            Aankho se bta deti hai sari baate, jaise mai to sab jaanta hi hoga
            Pta nhi tujse kab mulakat hogi
            Pr, vo bhi kya haseen raat hogi
            Mai teri baate tuje hi btaunga 
            Bhale hi, Kabhi mila nhi tujse
            pr jaanta hu tuje.

title: Apni aankho se dekhoge to
description: Nature
content:
Apni aankho se dekhoge to suraj bhi dekh loge
Meri nazar se dekho ab bhi chand pda hai
Apni aankho se dekhoge to sara sansaar bhi dekh loge
Meri nazar se dekho aasman bhi banjar pda hai
Apni aankho se dekhoge to dhadakta dil bhi dekh loge
Meri nazar se dekho mera dil kiske pass pda hai.

title: kuch karan hai
content:
Samandar mai lehre uthne ka kuch karan hai
Chand pr grehan lagne ka kuch karan hai
Rail pr in gittiyon k hone ka kuch karan hai
Mere yun khamosh rehne ka kuch karan hai
Varna samandar bhi shailaab laa sakta hai
Chand bhi raaton mai dard laa sakta hai
Rail bhi in gittiyon se takra kr zamee pr aa sakta hai
Khuda bhi kuch nhi kr sakta, ye halaat hi muh khulwa sakta hai.

title: Dost
description: For my best friend Kinshu
content:
Vo dost hai mera, usse apni jaan se bhi jada chahta hu
        Meri shayari uspe bhale hi na ho, pr sabse pehle usse sunata hu
        Meri zindagi usse bhale hi na ho, pr jab tak vo hai sirf tab tak jeena chahta hu
        Vo dost hai mera, mai usse apni jaan se bhi jada chahta hu
        Meri sari taqleef sari preshani sirf vo hi samjhta hai
        Chahe kuch bhi ho jaye, muje akela kabhi nhi rakhta hai
        Uske sare raaj sirf muje pta hai, sochta hoga vo ki auro ko bhi bta rakhe hai
        Samjhta hu usko har kisi se jada mai, har jagah humne apni dosti k jhande gaad rakhe hai
        Vo dost hai mera, mai usse apni jaan se bhi jada chahta hu
        Meri zindagi usse bhale hi na ho, pr jab tak vo hai sirf tab tak jeena chahta hu.

title: Kya kya sunoge
description: Kisi ne puchha tha kuch bolte kyu nhi
content:
Iss dil ki baat, Ye aadhi raat, Bin Mausam barsat 
Kya kya sunoge
Mera dehat, Sapne khurafaat, Samne hazraat
Kya kya sunoge
Mohabbat ki jaat, Roz ki mulakaat, Khamoshi ka raaz
Kya kya sunoge
Ye shayr ki kitaab khol du kya
Tumhare dukh se apni ek raat tol du kya
Jab sunna hoga dekh lena aankho mai
Puchunga thodi ki bol du kya.

title: Samandar
description: Using the fact that body floats after death
content:
Meri kismat buri thi ya tumhari aankhe sach mai itni gehri thi
Mai bhi iss samandar mai doob hi gya, jha tum sirf meri thi
Taair rha hu iss samandar mai lehre paar lga dengi
Badan ka wajan to halka hi tha bas dil nikalne ki deri thi.

title: Sahara liya
description: Raat me padhne ka bahana
content:
Sirf soch k jeena gawara n tha maine khwaab ka sahara liya
Iss duniya se khud ko bachna hi tha maine nakaab ka sahara liya
Iss gham se ab nikalna hi tha maine anjaam ka sahara liya
Phir bhi bhula n paya mai, ab bhi raaton ko jaagta hu
Yaad to tuje krna hi tha maine kaam ka sahara liya.

title: Akelapan
description: Lack of interest
content:
Bhook pyas neend sab mit rhi hai
        Teri yaad k aage duniya nhi dikh rhi hai
        Baitha hu apne sath teri yaad mai
        Kisse btau kaise btau kitna barbad mai
        Zindagi chhodne ki batte to mano aam ho gyi
        Ab ye dard ki zindagi mere naam ho gyi
        Jo likh rha hu khi vhi meri maut ka paigaam to nhi.

title: Akele jeene ki aadat
description: Purani hai, ig thoda or badal gya hu.
content:
Akele jeene ki aadat shayad ab pad gyi muje
Magar sath uska nhi chodunga mili agar khi muje
Magar sath na bhi ho to ab khi hum kabar nhi dundhte
Pathar dil banne ki koshish kar rha hu khabar nhi tuje
Gaano k rukk badal diye dukh sunna ab pasand nhi muje
Khud mai hi khush hu aaj kal duniya ka asar nhi mujpe
Kon badal sakta tha muje pr tune chodi kasar nhi usme.

title: Iss chaand me
description: Imagining Nature
content:
Iss chaand me, mai ek chehra dhundne ki koshish krta hu
        In tarro ko gin-gin kr, teri umr badhata rehta hu
        In parindo ke jode ko dekh kr, yu hi jeene ko dil krta hai
        In ped podho ko dekh kr, ab sang theharne ka man krta hai
        Iss samandar ko dekh kr, ab uss chaand se milne ko jee krta hai
        Iss chaand me, mai ek chehra dhundne ki kosish krta hu.

title: Ab aankhe band krli maine
description: Using different contexts of closing eyes
content:
Ab aankhe band krli maine
        Phir kyu mujhko vo dikhti hai
        Kehte hai uska shehar alag hai
        Phir kyu yaadon mai rehti hai
        Ab aankhe band krli maine
        To kyu mere sath vo jeeti hai
        Kehte hai bhor k sapne sach hote hai
        To kyu ye aankhe khulti hai
        Ab aankhe band krli maine
        Kyu mai sab jaan jata hu
        Kehte hai, tum kabhi uske nhi ho sakte
        Phir kyu use mai chahta hu.

title: Dhundhte Dhundhte
description: Fond of
content:
Tuje dhondhte dhondhte sarhade paar kar jate hai
        Aaj kal ye buzzdil har cheez se dar jate hai
        Ab khwab kya dekhe thake hare log
        Sote aise hai ki mar jate hai.

description: Going to sleep
content:
Pero mai chhale hai mere
        Kaaton pe chlta hu
        Jo phool tuje dena hai
        Uski jad dhundhta rehta hu
        Or kya khoob hai ye badal 
        Jinpe tere naam ka pehla akshar bunta hu
        Suraj doob gya in aasuo se ab
        Chand khil gya hoga mera
        Chlo, neend mai milta hu!!!

title: Kya pyar hai
content:
Har raat kisi ka chehra dekhna kya pyar hai
Har saans mai kisi ka naam lena kya pyar hai
Har baar ussi ki baat krna kya pyar hai
Har yaad uspe khatam hona kya pyar hai
Har chehra ek sa lagna kya pyar hai
Har ghar uska lagna kya pyar hai
Har baar uske naam pe hichkna kya pyar hai
Agar ye pyar hai to phir vo mere sath kyu nhi
Or jab hardum vo mere sath hai to ye pyar kyu nhi.

title: Pinzre ka kya hoga idhr
description: Smiling while writing
content:
Mai tumhe aazad krdu yha se
To pinzre ka kya hoga idhr
Jab parinde hwa mai udenge
To pinzre ka kya hoga idhr
Jab parinda hi anjan hai isse
To pinzre ka kya hoga idhr

title: Suraj
description: Deepesh means god of light/sunlight
content:
Mere naam ka matlab suraj aata hai
Sabko Roshni dene wala, din bhi andhere mai bitata hai
Sansar ka pyar nafrat sab dekh k doob jata hai 
Pr iss suraj ko shayad bhagwan bhi nhi dekh pata hai
Jab baarish ki koi boond nhi choo pata hai
To samdar se pani uthata hai
Pr har baar ye aasman isse apni aukat yaad dilata hai.

title: Khwaish
content:
Dekhu iss kadar tumhe jaise khet baarish ko
Khud ko un aankho mai dekhna mano ek khwaish ho
Apni khoobsurati meri aankho mai dekh lo manlo ek gujarish to
Khol lu ab ye aankhe ya hone du iss saajish ko.

title: Nadiyan
description: Quite deep to understand
content:
Nadiyo jaise behti in aankho ki palkon k neeche ek jhalak dikhta hai
Iss chand ki tasveer ko is samandar mai dekh kr ab falak dikhta hai
Aisi ret pe khada hu ki chand or ret k beech ab ek sadak dikhta hai
Kis tarah se dekhu ab, chaand or uske pratibimb k beech na falak na koi farak dikhta hai.

title: Vada
description: Promise
content:
Sapno mai tu kismat ban ke aata rha
Bin tere to koi shaqs muje n bhata yha
Ishq kaisa ye mai nye anjaam banata rha
Shehar k shor mai bhi har taraf sannata rha
Khamoshi chuni, tuje dhundhne or jata kaha
Jaa mai nhi marta tere bina ye mera vada rha.

title: Meri yaad nhi tu, tu sara Jahan hai
description: My first song ever
content:
Meri yaad nhi tu, tu sara Jahan hai
Parinda hu jiska mai vo aasaman hai
Sapno me meri ye kaisa sama hai
Choo loon bas usko ek khwahish yaha hai
Keh do ab tum kuch, sunne ko razzi dil kab se khada hai

Behti hai saanse tu dhadkan suna de
Iss gardish se leke zehar bhi pila de
Ishvar ko mujse ye kyaa gila hai
Dikha n tu jabse khuda na mila hai

Yaad nhi tu, tu sara Jahan hai
Parinda hu jiska vo aasaman hai
Iss aasama se ab tu kr bhi de baarish
Choo lo vo boonde jo inn palon mai chipa hai

Chaand se raushan ab mera Jahan hai
Phir chaand pe mere grehan kyu lga hai
Sitaron sa jab bhi tu tutta hai
Aye dil ki ye aahat tu raah dikha de
Sitara mera vo kha pe gira hai
Jha bhi mai jau, iss suraj ki tarah tu sang chala hai
Phir ab kyu n ye aahat koi raah dikhaye
Jeetunga kab mai har lamha sikhaye

Behti hai saanse tu dhadkan suna de
Iss gardish se leke zehar bhi pila de
Kehna na humko baati diya aye
Har baati khuda k hi aage jala hai.

Neel kantha k jaisa ye jeewan bna de
Garajte hai din bhar n naam le paye
Yaad nhi tu, tu sara Jahan hai
Parinda hu jiska mai vo aasma hai.

title: Mera pyar
description: Love is about
content:
Mera pyar tuje pana nhi, tuje chahna hai
Mera pyar tuje bachana nhi, tuje hasana tuje samjhana hai
Mera pyar itna bhi bachkana nhi, jitna tera muskurana hai
Mera pyar tera chehra batana nhi, tera chehra apni aankho mai dikhana hai

title: Mere khamoshi ka raaz
content:
Mere khamoshi ka raaz teri khushiyon mai hai
Mere jeewan ki kitab teri aankhon se hai
Tu hasti hai to lagta hai jaise mere sath ho
Tu mayus ho jaye lo lage sari duniya naraz ho
Chaand se roshan aasman ko dekhu to lage tu aas pass hai
Dekho in ped podho ko, patjhad mai bhi barish ki aas hai.

title: Ye jeene ki koshish hi maut jaisi lagti hai
description: Pyar kabhi bhi ho jata hai...maybe
content:
Ye jeene ki koshish hi maut jaisi lagti hai
Mohabbat ki bhi ek kashti hai
Baithne se pehle insaan nhi dekha
Chahat to dekhi pr anjaam nhi dekha

title: Meri maut ki sez
description: I really want this to happen
content:
Meri maut ki sez pe tum sir rakh k roo dena
Vo boonde mai falak tak le jana chahta hu
Rona mat tum jab muje jala rhe honge
Apne andar k angaar ko mai bhi bujhana chahta hu
Apne sapno mai bulana muje kabhi kabhi 
Apni band aankho ko tumhari aankho ki duniya dikhana chahta hu
Apna hath pher dena ek baar mere chehre pe
Marne k baad mai swarg ka ehsaas pana chahta hu.

title: Khuda hai vo
description: Worthless writing
content:
Na logo ki soch badal ske n hatho ki lakeere
Likh likh k kajaz kalam zaya kiya hai sabhi ne
Janjire pehna do agar pyar karna gunah hai to
Kalam kehti dua hai vo mai kehta khuda hai vo.

title: Agar hmari chahat alag
description: Usse haarne me jo mja hai vo usse jeetne me kaha
content:
Mai jo tujse kehna chahta hu vo tu likhit paye
Tera har uthaya kadam nyi reet laye
Meri parchahiyi ki tarah tu dhoop mai sahit aaye
Agar hmari chahat alag hai, agar hmari jung alag hai
Bhagwan krre mai har jau ye jung or tu jeet jaye.

title: Kya tuje thoda bhi ehsaas nhi hota
content:
Itna khalipan bardash nhi hota 
Kya tuje thoda bhi ehsaas nhi hota
Jab mai tere aas paas nhi hota
Kash muje kabhi pyar nhi hota
Khush rehna to jaise bhool hi chuka hu
Khushiyo k intezaar mai kabse door hi ruka hu
Pass jane se khushiyon k darta hu 
Door se dekh k khush rehne ka dikhawa karta hu
Har pal yaad krna tuje hi jarrori to nhi
Ghut ghut k kyu jee rha mai jeena majboori to nhi.

title: Padhne layak na bane
description:
Vo shayri bhi padhne layak na bane
Jisme tumhari pehchan na ho
content:
Meri zindagi ki mod ka aelaan krdo
Meri kitabon mai aake apna naam bhardo
Vo shayri bhi padhne layak na bane
Jisme tumhari pehchan na ho

title: Kya ab aise hi beetegi zindagi
content:
Kya ab aise hi beetegi zindagi
Kab tak chupa lunga tumhara naam 
Kalam bhi betaab hai naam likhne
Vo akshar jo dil se kabhi na mitne
Unhe kagaz pr se reh jate hai ghiste
Koi dekh na le naam tumhara
Itni jaldi nhi pana muje kinara
Mai dooba hua achha mehsoos krta hu
Sare maqsad bikhar jayenge
Tabhi to tera naam nazmo mai mehfoos rakhta hu.

title: Padh le muje
description: Samjh le vo wahi bohot hai.
content:
Samajh nhi aata zindagi kya dikhayegi ab
Mai samjhna chahta bhi nhi
Anjaam janta hu phir bhi mai janta nhi
Kis tarah se labz ada krrun apne
Ki tu  bhale isqh padhna aata nhi

title: Koi kar payega
content:
Kya samay meri khushiyon ki tarah teri yaadien mita payega
Kya meri tarah koi or nazmo ke sahare teri aankhein bta payega
Kya tujse baat kiye bina koi aur tujse kiye vaadien nibha payega
Jitni safai se maine likhi hai kya koi aur ye mulakatien bata payega
Agar jawab haan hai in sab ka to mai bhi theek hu khush hu
Agar nhi to aazma k dekh ye aashiq tuje teri hi aahatien suna jayega.

title: Nhi krte
content:
Dil k dard labzo me bayan nhi hote
Ye adhuri kahaniya nazmo me yahan nhi rote
Tum jo sath hote hamare
To hum kasmo ko zaya nhi krte
Tum jo pass hote hamare
To hum takiyo se lada nhi krte
Tumhari zulfe agar hoti pass chehre k
To hum sadiyo me hassa nhi krte.

title: Mai zuban se tera naam nhi bol pata
description: Idk why uska naam ni bol pata pr
content:
Mai zuban se tera naam nhi bol pata
Na hi ye kalam meri likh paa rhi hai tuje
Mai zuban se kabhi tuje bta nhi sakunga
Jo kalam meri har din bta rhi hai tuje
Mai zuban se tarif nhi kar pata kisi or ki
Or ye kalam bhi krne se roke jaa rhi hai muje.

title: Yaar
description: Kabhi just rhyme krte rehna feels good you know...
content:
Meri hazrat se kalam keh rha mere yaar
Teri nafrat se kam reh gya mera pyar
Gehri sankat mai sanam reh rha meri haar
Kaidi har waqt ye zulam seh rha aisa sansaar.

title: Dua hai meri
description: Yeah that's, wish again
content:
Tu jo bhi karna achha karna jeewan mai, dua hai meri
Mai n ho sakunga tera, pr khush rhe tu hardum, dua hai meri
Jitna pyar tujse kr liya iss jeewan mai utna koi kr n ske, dua hai meri
Itni nafrat bhi mat krna humse ki hum seh n ske, dua hai meri

title: Kabhi tu bhi
description: Self doubt wali cheezien maybe...
content:
Koi pasand nhi karta muje aisa khyal aata hai
Bus mai koi pass kyu nhi baithta sawaal aata hai
Itna bura kyu hu mai ki apni burai hi nhi dekh pata
Itna dukhi kaise hu mai ki oro ko sukh nhi de pata
Meri galti kya hai madad ka hi hath badhya tha
Tere dukh baatne ki koshish ki vo bhi raas n aaya kya
Har baar pehle mai message kyu kru
Kabhi tu bhi haal jaan liya kr
Har baar mai hi dusro mai tuje kyu dhundhu
Kabhi tu bhi galat pehchaan liya kr

title: Samjh jana
description: I think kaafi buri lag sakti ye, pr muje daalni thi so
content:
Tuje pana meri kismat mai nhi
Tuje chahna hi zindagi bani
Khud se pyar krna, meri tarah nhi
Mujse kr liya to galat bhi ho jayega shi
Jis din tere khwaab mai aa jau samjh jana mar gya
Jis din tere khwaab mai na aau samjh jana bikhar gya.

title: Zindagi
description: Ik last line ka pehla meaning jo hit krta kaafi xD
content:
Zindagi bhi in dairy k panno ki tarah khali lagti hai
Antar yhi hai ki mai unpe kuch likh nhi sakta
Kalam jo chal rhi hai panno pe, chub rhi hai muje
Kha rahi hai duniya in aam panno ko, kitni bhook lagi hai tuje.

title: Kuch dikhta hi nhi
description: True tho
content:
Chahat jada hai wade kam reh gaye
Pyar aadha hai mere labz keh rahe
Mai nibhaunga zarror jo bhi wade kiye hai
Mai chahunga har roop jo bhi tumse bane hai
Rota nhi ab khamosh rehta hu
Log sochte hai bas aisa hi hu
Dosti khodi, pyar mila hi nhi kabhi
Ghar walo ki umeede puri krni hai abhi
Apni tuti phuti zindagi karni hai sahi
Tumhara pyar nhi, to kuch dikhta hi nhi

title: Maut k samay hoto pe tera naam hoga
description: Seriously yr, uske naam ka mtlb bohot achha hai xD
content:
Maut k samay hoto pe tera naam hoga
Khauf hai muje tera dil ya samshan hoga
Bharosa nhi hota muje logo pe
Kyi tarah k insaan dekhe hai
Pr matlabi duniya ne kuch nhi diya siwaye dhoko k
Tere naam k hazar matlab muje sare pasand aa gye
Tere jaisi hazar mukhde dikh gyi pr koi na bhaye.

title: Satane aati hai
content:
Har din ek nyi kahani aati hai
Jis din yaad nhi aayi, ussi raat
Sapno mai vo satane aati hai
Sapno mai vo vo bhi bol jati hai
Jo kalam bhi meri bta ni pati hai
Jo pyar vo batton mai dikha ni pati
Vo pyar vo har raat jatane aati hai
Pr kismat dikhane meri suraj roz uthta hai
Jalane aata hai uss rog ko jo roz dukhta hai

title: Truth
content:
Sach likha hai sach hi likhunga
Waqt hi bta dega ghao kaise bharte hai

title: Aasun nhi aate pr
content:
Yaad aati hai ab aasun nhi aate pr
Dil mai ghabrahat hai aawaj nhi aati pr
Roz ek chehra dekhta hu nazakat nhi jati pr
Jeene k liye sirf itna nhi kafi pr

title: Raaz kehna tha
description: Second line bhi, achhi hai vaise
content:
Dar nhi maut ka muje dar hai aawaj nikalne ka
Dar nhi baat krne me dar hai andaz badalne ka
Ek subah ka sapna mai sevak or usne vo taaz pehne tha
Aankhein khuli or mai bhool gya muje jo raaz kehna tha

title: Gale lagane ka mann
content:
Usse gale lagane ka mann mera bhi hota hai
Jab milte nhi raaste tab dil mera bhi rota hai
Karan jo bhi ho akelepan ka, khyal tera hi hota hai
Gale lga k usse pass rakhne ka khyal akela bhi sota hai
Man padh sakta hu uski aankho se uska mai
Dhadkane chalti hai jab dil uski aankho pe rukta hai
Ek haseen pari ka sehra uthta hai
Jab sir mera ishwaar k aage jhukta hai 
Ibbadat krta hu ishwaar se uske khushiyon ki
Phir bhi khush hai ya nhi dil ye puchta hai.

title: Aasaan hai
description: Bas aa jate hain words...lines
content:
Bina chalaye ye kalam ab din nhi katta mera
Aasaan hai, aankhe band ki or kiya sajda tera
Log puchte hai aaj kal kaise likh lete ho
Kuch jawab nhi de pata, bta nhi sakta inhe dil ka rasta mera

title: Ab bhi
description: It just goes on
content:
Chhot dil pe lagi thi mere bhi, khyal maut ka aaya tha
Jab jaa rhi thi tu aankho k samne se, or mai alvida tak bol na paya tha
Mai tha vhi piche khada bechain sa, aankhe nam kr laut kr aaya tha
Bechain tha pta tha nhi aayegi wapas phir bhi intezaar mai pura din bitaya tha
Vo din bhi ab tak jaari hai
Ab bhi vo saamne se jaari hai
Ab bhi aankhein hain nam
Ab bhi badal thoda bhari hai.

title: Jitna tune chaha, utna hi kadam chala mai
description: Was trying alliteration ig
content:
Sachi siyahi sazati saaf panne
Shor sharabe mai vo hi sath chalte
Sayri, sangharsh, sangeet se hi vasta
Saral sunder sushil sathi sath rehta saans sa
Likhna meri kla likhna hi mera dharam hai
Jitna tune chaha, utna hi kadam chala mai

title: Ye dairy mere sare raaz janti hai
content:
Jo baate mai khud ko bhi nhi btata kabhi
Vo baate ye shayri muje btati hai
Kyu likhna band kru mai ab
Jab kalam meri or chalna chahti hai
Pal pal bator k iss kitab mai chipaye rakha isse
Mai hu kon abhi ye duniya nhi janti hai
Tumhe bhi nhi pta abhi to mere baare me
Ye aankhe sirf muje hi padhne kyu aati hai
Khair mere nazm tum tak pahuch gye yhi kafi hai
Anjaam likhu bhi kyu ab mai, jab meri shuruvaat hi abhi baki hai.

title: Khoobsurat
content:
Khoob surat dekhe
Koi khoobsurat nhi lagta

title: Jaisa dikhta hu mai hu nhi vaisa
description: Shayad mood ajeeb hoga uss time xD
content:
Jaisa dikhta hu mai hu nhi vaisa
Iss duniya k liye ek paigaam laya hu
Khuda hai vo, mai bas ek aam saya hu
Itna pyar mat krna kabhi, ki unhe bhagwan ka darza dedo
Pass bhi n jana kabhi uske tum, agar ajnabi rota ladka dekho
Akele jeena seekh lo ab khud ko guroor se bharta dekho
Dil itna pathar bna lo apna ki aasu ka katra tak n nikle jab usse marta dekho
Sansaar ye kamjor dil k liye nhi, koi mile bhatka to usse sahi rasta dedo
Bhool hi jana behtar hai agar usme or tumme ab bhi faasla hai to.

title: Meri aahatien bhi toh judi hai
content:
Khud ko juda bhi mai kaise kru
Meri aahatien bhi toh judi hai
Kaise bhoolu mai meri hi kismat
Meri aankhien ye sab dekhti hai
Teri baatien suni bhi n maine
Pr tere aankho ki khwahish likhi hai.

title: Gham bhar deta hai samay
description: Time heals?
content:
Gham bhar deta hai samay
Ye sach sabko bta to rha hu
Pr gham kaho ya pyar isse
Badhta hi jaa rha bin wajah

title: Vo
content:
Vo meri jaan to nhi
Pr vo hai to zinda hu
Vo meri syahi to nhi
Pr vo hai to likhta hu
Vo meri manzil to nhi
Pr vo hai to rasta hai
Vo bhagwan to nhi
Pr vo hai to astha hai.

title: Aabaad
description: Likhne ka maqsad to achha hi hai...
content:
Kimat nhi mere kalam ki abhi logo k nazro mai
Barbad to nhi khi siyahi meri in halke nazmo mai
Chahat buri nhi hai likhne ki meri 
Ek hi maqsadh rha hai likhne ka mera barso se
Aabaad rhe mere jane k baad bhi mere shayri mai tu
Mor pankh bhi nhi rakhta, jabse mere dairy mai tu.

title: Baadal
content:
Baadal aasman k mere garaj rhe barso se
Pure Jahan mai andhera cha gya ab kab barsoge.

title: Pyar ka matlab badal kr du
description: Usse amar krne ka zariya, kaash ban paye
content:
Likhna nhi chodunga, kya pta duniya ko..pyar ka matlab badal kr du
Har akshar dil mai base hai, mar bhi jau to tuje chahta dil to amar kr du

title: Khuda milta…dua se nhi
description: College me sunana tha instantly ye bani...
content:
Uchaiya chuni hai to mehnat kro, khuda milta…dua se nhi
Ye pehla nazm suna rha hu pr haklaunga nhi mai, batte ye dil se nikalti hai zuban se nhi.

title: Jitni karib meri maut utna door tujse milna lagta hai.
content:
Jitni karib meri maut utna door tujse milna lagta hai
Har nazm mai maut likhi hai apni maine
Pyara ho jau khuda ko, ab bin uske dil na lagta hai
Dil krta hai kisi din sab bta du iss duniya ko
Tera ek khyal dil mai aake sari bate mita jata hai
Pehla thodi hu mai ek tarfa pyar krne wala
Aashiq chahte hue bhi nhi paa sakte, tabhi to likha jata hai
Vo tera khyal raat me, jo takiye pe mera sir tika jata hai
Teri soch tera haal chal bin puche tu sapno me dikha jata hai
Jitni karib meri maut utna door tujse milna lagta hai.

title: Kabhi tuje na soch k khud ko sochu to koi dikhta hi nhi
content:
Kabhi tuje na soch k khud ko sochu to koi dikhta hi nhi
Tuje ghar ki laxmi kehte honge mai khota sikka hi shi
Dil mera aasuo se bhara, Vhi aankhe pathar ki bani hai
Kaise na karu teri madad ussi waqt ki ret pe tu bhi khadi hai.

title: K liye
content:
Itna dukh kafi hai kya mere shayar ban-ne k liye
Ya kisika marna baki hai muje ghayal karne k liye
Ya kisi or k khatir mai hi bna hu shayad marne k liye
Kaash aisa hota, mai to chahta hu uske liye kuch karna
Pr jung to ho, pehli kataar me hai ye kayar ladne k liye.

title: Kisi ne kha
description: I feel like...choose your path, ya to anjaam achha hoga, ya sabak
content:
Kisi ne kha jitne kam dost utna achha
Kisi ne kha pyar wyar chhod, sapna saja
Koi kehta bheed k sath chalna, vhi
Kisi ne kha dusro ka rasta chhod, khudka bana
Kisi ne kha likhhna band krde
Kisi ne kha jitna chahe kalam utna chala
Itne to log bhi nhi zindagi mai jitni baate hai
Bas kro or kitna sikhaoge
Tumne to dekhi bhi nhi vo, jo raatien humne kaati hai

title: Shayad meri kalam mera pyar jta degi
content:
Shayad meri kalam mera pyar jta degi
Shayad nazre hi meri sab bta dengi
Phool jo phekogi tum meri kafan pe
Hwa se bach jayenge ya kafan bhi meri ab daga degi.

title: Jawaab
description: Muje yaad hai maine kya pucha tha xD
content:
Likhunga mai aakhri saans tak
Na jane niklegi aakhri saans kab
Shayri ab dikhau bhi kaise mai
Tera jawab to hai baki aaj tak.

title: Kya samhala khud ko dil k sharabi ne
content:
Jaisa hu vaisa dikhta hu sochte log
Socho kaisa hu jab aisa likhta roz
Dikhta nhi jo maine pehna nakab inhe
Kya samhala khud ko dil k sharabi ne
Kuch na chahu ab sare talash hue khatam
Ghumta hu ab bane laash liye kalam.

title: Likhu kitna iss gham ko
content:
Likhu kitna iss gham ko
Kha ho tum
Kha vo duniya, Kha hum do
Sara Jahan dhundha hai
Kabhi puch k to dekho
Tumhe kahan kahan dhundha hai
Baadlo mai mili tum tarro mai dikhi
Raato mai mili tum phoolo sa khili
Tumhare sath maine Jahan ghuma hai.

title: Intezaar
content:
Podha socha tha phoolo ka maine
Hath aaye sirf kate hai
Uske intezaar mai din beet jata
Or raat yaad mai kate hai
Har din chubhte muje vo
Jo khud se kiye maine vade hai
Mar nhi sakta
Jhooth bol aaya tha maut se jaake mai.

title: Khushi ho gham nhi
content:
Na koi bura mujse na hi koi achha
Akela mera rasta mai akela dil ka sacha
Sochu kaise vo pal jisme Khushi ho gham nhi
Socha to saansien kam hue or dhadkan tham gyi.

title: Aasun
content:
Kore panno ko teri aankhe itni pyari lagi
Raatein beet gyi unpe likhi kahani kayi
Fikar nhi kalam khatam hone ki muje
Kalam se meri aasun nikalti syahi nahi.

title: Bhagwan k liye
content:
Usne bin jane muje kitne arman de diye
Is janam to milan bhi ek baar hua hamara
Vo bhi sapno mai hum samshan mai mile
Phir jala ek angaar sa dil me mere aaj raat
Dil hi hai mera, vhi jalata diye apne bhagwan k liye.

title: Itna pyar kon krega
content:
Meri shayri padh k tu khush hai 
To likhta rahunga mai tu chahegi jitna
Pyar apne rab se bhi tu payegi kitna
Itna pyar kon krega tuje jitna kr chuka mai
Mar n jaye vo bhagwan bhi apni santan dekh k
Ek baar jaa uss rab ko mera dard suna de.

title: Yaad aane k liye mere pass sirf gham hai
description: Baki janamo ki baat kr rha :)
content:
Khushi k pal Jeevan mai mere bhot kam hai
Yaad aane k liye mere pass sirf gham hai
Bin lakeero k hath mai kajaz or kalam hai
Lakeere banate banate meri syahi khatam hai
Jo lakeer bani vo btati tu sath mere har janam hai
Na mat karna ab sath nibhane ko tuje meri kasam hai.

title: Khali dimag shaitaan ka
content:
Har pal jehan mai aa jati tu yaado ka darban na hai
Socha kuch pal khud k sath jee lo pr nakam rha mai
Akela in raho pe, padhu kya tuje sochne se aaram kha hai
Kon kehta khali dimag shaitaan ka mera bhagwan vha hai

title: Pyar mai koi kasar nhi chhoda
content:
Pyar mai koi kasar nhi chhoda
Kabhi mai to kalam kabhi rota
Kitne aasu gira chuka
Ye takiya uske kandhe jitna naram nhi hota
Kha sone jau mai
Neend shayad aa jati tu agar karib hota

title: Kuch dekr hi jaunga
content:
Kaash aasman ka tara ban jau mai
Khud hara kisi ka sahara ban jau mai
Kitno ne soch liya mere maun ka karan
Ab kalam se hi kehta hu
Kuch dekr hi jaunga, nhi chahiye maut sadharan

title: Waqt nhi dekhta
content:
Meri lakeero se bna har akshar nazm hai
Aasun ka kaaran ban jata kalam, rasm hai
Waqt nhi dekhta kalam mera
Diya waqt jab maine pyar ko
Waqt ne bhi toda bharam mera

title: N jane
content:
N jane ye aasuon ki dhar is waqt ki ret pe kab dam todegi
N jane ye saanso ka bhaar is badan ko kab tak duboyegi
N jane ye dil ki pukaar phir kab cheekh kar bolegi
Kitni baato se anjaan hu mai, theek tumhari tarah.

title: Dekh to
content:
Tere chehre ki parchai dikhti hai in aasuon mai, dekh to
Chawkhat ghar ki kitni khali jab se langa tune, dekh to
Saansein rok lu muje dar hai tu unme bhi hai
Baatien jo karu muje dar hai tu unme bhi hai
Khamoshi mai tuje thoda jada pata hu
Shehar mai khada mai aadha aadha hu
Aasuon ki koi keemat bataiye
Khushiyan kharidni hai, dhan chahiye

title: Kabhi khatam nhi hogi
description: Bohot logo me uski shakal dikh jati hai
content:
Kabhi khatam nhi hogi teri aahat
Kabhi khatam nhi hogi meri chahat
Dard pasand hai dil ko mere
Likhta kuch mai dikhta kuch hu
Duniya k liye mukh do mere
Shakal teri har baar mil gayi kahi n kahi
Bas aankhein nhi un mukhdo mai the

title: Apne saath
content:
Kab tak chalegi kalam in bazuo se
Kab tak rahegi sanam in aasuo mai
Dhundh to le ek nya thikana apna
Beh jane du in aasuon ko aaj 
Aaj k baad chehra mat dikhana apna
Jeena chahta hu kuch pal apne saath
Chhod kyu nhi deti
Chhod to gye sare apne saath

title: Na tu aaye paas mere, Na aaye mere pass maut
description: Jeena mera muskil ya tera naam jada :)
content:
Jeena mera muskil ya tera naam jada
Sapna hai ya tarra vo jo har sham aata
Rota hu mai roz iss takiye mai kyu doob k
Aasu bhot, aawaj na aati diwaro se tu puch le
Likhna mere liye itna aasaan hai
Jitna dekhna khwaab or ye chaand hai
Hath kyu nhi hai bandhe mere
Rote padh ke khuda bande tere
Dil ye mera tod sako to tod lo
Chaho to dukh bhi apna tol lo
Bol do kyu darte ho apne aap se
Socho jara zuban kyu hai kaapte
Jada lage dard to lakeere dedo hath k
Phooti kismat chooti tu, tuti ghadi pr waqt mera badla kya
Khud hi ishwaar khud hi mai pathar kabhi bhi leta badla kya
Dil mera saaf bhot
Nikli jabse saans 
Na tu aaye paas mere
Na aaye mere pass maut.

title: Agar
content:
Agar mile kahi nadi kinare umeed tooti si
Agar mile koi dhadkan, dil se roothi hue
Agar dikhe koi chehra utra hua, 
Ya mile koi aankh sooji si
To lauta dena meri amaanat muje
Kr dena riha, de dena jamanat muje
Intezaar me hu mai, pyar ek bala hai
Jiske jaal me hu mai
Aadat hai logo ki khel khelna, kabhi khilone the
Ab istemaal me hu mai.

title: Vo ped
content:
Vo ped k kuch patte jo sookh kr bikhar gye
Sameta bhi gya to khaas jalane k liye
Kuch shakhayein jo gir gyi thi toot kr
Vo bhi daali gyi aag badhane k liye
Jalte rhe sab patte taaki vo hath sek sake
Phir vhi hath badhe raakh hatane k liye.

title: Baarish ho gyi
content:
Aaj kalam chali or baarish ho gyi
Umeedein milke khwaish ho gyi
Likhna majboori hai kehta to hu
Kahi ye koi farmayish to nahi
Achha lagta hai nagme padhna, jab aankhein khulti hain
Jab laut kr aana ho ya jab bhi raatein bhugti hain
Ab bas sahi waqt pe galat raasta chhod diya hai
Phir bhi likh rha hu to zaahir si baat hai
Mere andr ka bachha faasla, cheekh kr ro diya hai

title: Ladke
content:
Zimmedariyan bhar jati hain koi khwaab nhi hota
Sawal bohot aise hote jinka koi jawaab nhi hota
Khushi sabki chahiye or apna koi khyal nhi hota
Sab sath leke chalna to hai pr koi saath nhi hota
Kuch ladke hi hain, bas ladte hi hain
Kuch gharpe bhi hain bas padhte ni hain
Bahar bhi hain kuch aawara ladke
Or chhip k baithe kuch nakara gharpe
Ladki hue to gudiya laadli laxmi hue hai
Ladka hai to aaya hai sahaara banke
Shayad vo hasta chehra mehnat k peeche thak gya hai
Haal mat puchna pr, usko “sab theek hai” ratt gya hai
Kya krna hai zindagi me pta hai usse, kya krna tha kahi dabb gya hai
Vo ladka hi hai jo akela marr k bhi bach gya hai.

title: Kyu
content:
Tuje bhi pta rehta hai mera dard kyu
Dhakdta nhi hai dil mera kaanpta hai
Mausam badle pr dil mera sard kyu
Tujhme or duniya mai itna fark kyu
Mehsoosh krta tha itna achha mai
Bachha tha bna aakhir mai mard kyu
Aabadi bhot pr aajadi nhi hai
Khusiyan mangte ye bikhari kahike
Jo bhi likh du mai vhi shi, hath me mere falak chhipa hai
Mai na rakhta vaade pr kalam nibhaye
Jab tak syahi tu tab tak raahi hu
Manzil maine maut iss janam likha hai.

title: Ek jaise kitne hum pr ek nhi hai
content:
Padhti tu kitabe padhta mai bhi logo ko
Rakhti mor pankh kore panne pe
Mai vhi rakhta dhoko ko
Yaad krti jawab tu likhte padhte
Mai bhi yaad krta anjaam jo mile rishte rakh k
Ek jaise kitne hum pr ek nhi hai
Mera waqt badla pr teri ret shi hai
Manta tha na bhagwan or rakhta tha n vrat jo
Aaj bhooke pet vhi hai
Puchne wala aakhir hai kon
Kyu mai bhooka kyu mai maun
Na tuje aata pyar na muje maut.

title: Bilkul buri nhi hai
description: I'm so sorry agar maine kahi galat likha usse to
content:
Kitna likhu khud muje aati sharam
Bura tujko bola lagta khudpe kalank
Nhi tu buri nhi hai
Apni jagah tu puri sahi hai
Bura tha waqt tera
Bura aaj bhakt tera
Sunta sabki mai
N jane ho jau kab behra.

title: Mehmaan
content:
Takiye mai mere tu kalam mai mere khuda mai
Duniya bna liya tuje apna tu phir bhi juda hai
Itna gham likhta mai
Soch dil kitna rota hai
Dard kitna hota hai
Pr gham se hi meri pehchan ban gyi ab
Kuch pal k liye aayi thi aaj, phir mehman ban gyi ab.

title: Utaru kaise ban baitha bhagwan jo
content:
Kaise likhta hu har akshar kya krta mai mehsoos
Kisko fikar idhr kiska naam rakhta mai mehfooz
Har sham chaand aata banke mera dard
Din bhi lagta bhoj muje jabse tera karz
Utaru kaise karz tera
Utaru kaise chaand ko
Utaru kaise gham mera
Utaru kaise ban baitha bhagwan jo.

title: Bhakt matr tera
description: Kisi ko bhejne k liye lkhna tha, pr...
content:
Dekh meri jaan aaj mehfil mai baitha hu
Log tuje sunne k liye bekarar ho rhe hai
Mai to bhakt matr tera
N jane ye kuch to pyar keh rhe hai
To gazal kuch aisi hai
Aankhien kuch kehti inki
Or nazar kuch kehti hai
Likhna kiske liye likhta kiske liye
Tu mere kalam ki nok pe baithi hai.

title: Itna bhi kya
content:
Likhte samay dhyan tujpe du ya gazal pe
Jisse tu nhi dikhti vishwash kaise kru uss nazar pe
Manzil dekhne ki itni jaldi muje dhyan kya hi du safar pe
Itna bhi kya pyar ho gya jo tu nhi to log hi mar gye nagar k.

title: Kya paya
content:
Kis kashti ka raahi hu kis kashti me taira hu
Kis sagar ka pani hu kis kuve me thehra hu
Kya khoya kya paya
Kya boya kya aaya
Bade Khushi se gham bata gairo ka
Khuda mere liye tu kya laya.

title: Nam chadar
content:
Na tu mujse pyar krti na muje kisi or se krne deti
Na tu mere sath ladti na muje bin tere marne deti
Ye kaisa ishq tera 
Meri jaan ki kimat teri muskaan se kam tol rha hu
Ye kaisa harsh mera
Maun mukh kholte hi gham bol rha hu
Tera ghar bhi na bheega shailaab mai
Mai to chadar bhi nam oodh rha hu.

title: Aana zarur
content:
Mera shayar hona zarori nhi apni maut likhne k liye
Zarori tha bas ghayal hona
Jab kisi ko pyar kahi mile hi na to kaha rehta vo
Koi aasha bhi nhi dikhti or kitna sehta vo
Jashn manao meri maut ka rona nhi
Aashiq marte kha aaj kal sacha pyar hota nhi
Ek hi wajah nhi thi marne ki, kismat hi kuch yu likhi meri
Aaj bhi uska naam likh nhi paa rha, lakeere nhi manti meri
Pr tu aana zaror maut pe meri
Chahat jada nhi bachi ab
Ek aasu tu bhi tapka dena, ek phool kafan pe chada dena
Meri maut ka dukh hua tuje dekh k khush hounga
Apne bare mai nhi socha jeete jee, swarg mile muje dua karna.

title: Teri sunta hai khuda
description: Insider :)
content:
Duayein teri sunta hai khuda
Tabhi ab tak muje zinda rakha.

title: Khaas to hai naam tumhara
content:
Har panna padhna iss kitaab ka mere
Khud ko itna achha likh rakha hai maine
Socho na kitne mehfoos hai hum yha
Akele sirf tum or mai, koi nhi dekhta iss duniya ko
Pasand hai muje in aksharo se tumhari aankhein banana
Magar aankho mai kabhi khud ko nhi banaya maine
Pyar bhot sacha hai mera, sabko yahi bataya maine
Khaas to hai naam tumhara
Khaas ho har sham tumhara
Dua hai mere aasuo ki
Phisle to ho gaal tumhara.

title: Bahana hai
content:
Rona nhi meri baate sun k, abhi khamoshi meri dekhi kha
Khudgarz aankhien dhoop se nikal kr chav mai bhi baithi kha
Kitna sacha hoga uska pyar jo apne aasuo se nikalta ho apne pyar ko hasane
Kitna majboor hoga vo dil jo har din tutta ho apne pyar ko bachane
Koi puche kabhi mujse khuda ne zuban di hai to kalam kyu chalana hai
Keh du janab khamoshi mai usse baate krte hum, kalam to bas bahana hai.

title: Mukti nhi milti
content:
Ye kaisa laash ban gya hu
Roz jalta dil pr mukti nhi milti
Roz aati yaado mai
Phir bhi usse dekhne ki iccha rukti nhi dil ki.

title: Bhoolna
content:
Usse bhoolne ki baat bhi soche kaise ab
Jiski yaad mai khud ko bhoola baithe hum.

title: Shayad
description: Thoda deep hai maybe...
content:
Kha tha hardum khushiyan dunga
Shayad isliye hmara dil unhe swikaar nhi
Pr dil mera unke dimag mai basa hai
Shayad isliye kabhi unhe hamara khyaal nhi.

title: Aayi vo
content:
Apne kalam pe kabu nhi mera
Jab se syahi banke aayi vo
N jane kaise doob mra mai
Jaise aankhein nhi khayi ho.

title: Dusre ki nazar se dekh lu khud ko
content:
Khud se nafrat hone lagti muje
Agar kabhi dusre ki nazar se dekh lu khud ko
Waqt pariksha lene aaye agar
100 mai se 99 dukh or kasam se ek du sukh ko
Ek bhi na deta mai magar khyalo pe haq nhi chlta
Kya pta kabhi jane anjane mai phir dekh lu usko.

title: Gham lene aate to sasta lga dete
content:
Muskan to ab de na sakta kisi ko mai
Pr gham lene aate to sasta lga dete
Shakal na pucha kro mujse kaisi hai
Kya pta dil pucha hota to sacha bta dete
Rote hai kayar raaton mai chup chup k
Or dusro k saamne khud ko achha bhala kehte
Jab bhagwan se bhi vishwas uth jaye to aana
Aksar andher galio k musafir rasta bta dete.

title: Kabhi kabhi
content:
Kabhi khud ko bhot bda mehsoos krta hu
Kabhi khud ko hi kos leta hu mai
Kabhi kisi ki Khushi mai kabhi gham mai ro leta hu mai
Magar kisi k aate hi jhat se aasu poch leta hu mai
Kabhi chhoti chhoti baat pe Khushi kabhi hasne ko taras jata hu
Kabhi bina baat k dukhi kabhi gusse mai baras jata hu
Dard mai rahu to or dukhi hone ka man krta hai
Khush ho jau kuch pal to dil ghabrane lagta hai
Mai theek hu ya nhi muje khud nhi pta
Kabhi lagta hai sab theek kar rha hu
Kabhi kabhi muje kuch nhi pta
Chhoti chhoti baat leke sochta rehta hu
Kabhi kabhi mai khud se kuch bolta rehta hu
Kabhi shakal bhot khush haal lagti
Kabhi lagta isne to bhot saha hoga
Dimag kabhi khali nhi rehta
Kuch nhi to yhi sochne lagta hu
Ki saamne wala bhi kuch soch rha hoga
Kabhi ek tarfa pyar kr deta tanha
Kabhi vo jo waqt k sath badla
Pehle lagta tha har sham bimaar hu
Abhi lagta nhi, bas ek aam insaan hu.

title: Baadal
content:
Dekho na in nadaan baadalo ko
Zameen or aasman ka rishta bna rhe
Barish k boond ki chot ko milna bta rhe
Kuch raaz to in boondon mai bhi hai
Dard nhi hota n jane kaisi chot lagi hai
Ulta Khushi milti jaise pyar krne wale mil rhe ho
Khushboo is barish ki lagti jaise phool khil rhe ho
Pr baarish jati to thoda soona sa lagta hai
Khushi k palo ko phir bhoolna padta hai
Barish k baad k keechad ko bhi kya hi dosh du
Jaise keechad mai kamal dikhta hai
Vaise dard mai roz kalam likhta hai
Muje to dono ki bhook hardum se lagi
Kuch mehsoos to kru, chahe gham hi sahi.

title: Waqt
content:
Itna dukh hota muje soch k
Ki tu anjaan hai mere uss gham se jo tune diye
Gham milne hi the to kaash vo teri dua hoti
Maine to jo jana har vo khwaish tere pure kiye
Mai ye bhi puri krta, ab to meri har dua roti
Inhe bhi sunne wala koi nhi
Khamosh rehte ye meri tarah pr koi nhi
Waqt k sath kya pta bikhar jaye ye bhi
Har dard maine waqt ko soap diya hai
Pr jab khuda hi dokhebaaz mera
Uski yaad kya aa gyi, isne waqt bhi rok diya hai.

title: Nazar
description: Meri berang duniya
content:
Dil to usse judda hua hai
Pr aankhe har raste pr akele chalti hai
Duniya se juda hua mai
Tabhi duniya har mod pr muje sehti hai
Meri berang duniya ye
Itni nadan, aksar hi shakal pasand karti hai
Kami tujme nhi usme hai
Jo kehte achha hai pr shakal bhot kharab hai
Uski aankhon me mat doob
Aankhein sundar uski pr nazar bhot kharab hai.

title: Bin baat
content:
Tujse baat krne ki himmat nhi hoti
Or teri nazar mai meri kimat nhi hogi
Sach kahu, mai padh sakta hu tera dimag
Mera kya, tere liye mai hardum khuli kitaab
Kabhi padhna muje bhi
Banana wale ne sath nhi diya pr dil saaf diya hai
Kabhi tuje door rakha kabhi din raat diya hai
Pass nhi tu mere to kya hua
Pyar bhi to maine hi bin baat kiya hai.

title: Waqt nhi hua
description: just for small reference din/ujala referred as happiness and raat/andhera, ofc
content:
Iss sannate ne dil mera itna saaf bna diya
Sakth jarorat thi tab duniya ne sath kha diya
Khushiyon ka gala ghot din bhi raat bna diya
Yamraj aaya khushiyan lene maine bhi hath khada kiya
Magar shayad mera haqq nhi dua
Yam bhi bola abhi tera waqt nhi hua.

title: Sachha nhi
description: :) for real bruh
content:
Thode kaam me badan to thak jata hai
Magar ye man hai ki thakta nhi
Neend nhi aankhon mein so sakta nhi
Kya kru is sannate me in yado k sath
Likh likh k kalam ghis di, phir bhi log bolte pyar tera sachha nhi.

title: Mai karigar tu gazal
content:
Mai karigar tu gazal
Tu khuda mai kam akal
Shyahi tu mai bas kalam
Badsurat mai tu har shakal
Manta hu hamara koi mel nhi
Nadan tha mai jab pyar hua
Bataya nhi kisi ne bachho ka khel nhi
Tu lakhon mai basi pr tujsa koi ek nhi
Zarorat muje sare sansar ki is waqt
Pr mere pass ek kandhe ka bhi tek nhi.

title: Waqt k pass itna waqt hai
description: Last line alag si lagi to it's ok xD
content:
Waqt k pass itna waqt hai
Sabko alag siksha dene lga ye
Koi anath kisi ko lakh rishte dene lga ye
Kisi k liye rukta nhi pr kuch k pass thehar jata hai
Khush ho jata jab gaon ki mitti ko sehar lata hai.

title: Mere sau panne
description: 100 pages bhar gye the...
content:
Mere ye sau panne
Padhte log rhe chawkanne
Aasu bha k shyahi ki tareef krna
Ruko nhi aage maut ki tareekh padhna
Sab likhunga sabar rakho
Mere ye sau panne saboot hai mere pyar ka
Mere ye sau panne kya khoob hai mere jaaneza
Pyar hai vo tera, khush vo jeet mai to haar ja
Usse dukhi krke so payega kya, behas kr rha khamakha
Bhoolna hi hai to pyar na kr, dekh k aage bhad izhaar na kr.
